summary: The Wildfire Grid Resiliency Act directs the Secretary of Energy to establish a demonstration program to improve electric grid resilience in the face of wildfires. The Resilience Accelerator Demonstration Program will provide awards to National Laboratories for projects showcasing innovative technologies to enhance grid resilience, including technologies for vegetation management monitoring and first responder safety. The bill authorizes $10,000,000 in appropriations for each fiscal year from 2026 to 2029.
